
图片格式：

k-means result：

k-means result：

(74.79452435428813, 47.26214182280036)

k-means++ result：

(0.03058677705095214, 0.07247204236876549)
(37.98877709728256, 27.17701588828706)
k-means result：

(0.23116773872268043, 0.44459649900420073)
(287.1103314935691, 166.72368712657527)
k-means result：

(0.1414220103912869, 0.3643577748390009)
(175.64613690597832, 136.63416556462533)
k-means result：

(0.10977491645045694, 0.19332427832268598)
(136.34044623146752, 72.49660437100724)
k-means result：

(0.06022103410168126, 0.1260323781941343)
(74.79452435428813, 47.26214182280036)


由于从标记文件的width，height计算出的anchor boxes的width和height都是相对于整张图片的比例，
而YOLOv2通过anchor boxes直接预测bounding boxes的坐标时，坐标是相对于栅格边长的比例（0到1之间），
因此要将anchor boxes的width和height也转换为相对于栅格边长的比例。转换公式如下：

w=anchor_width*input_width/downsamples
h=anchor_height*input_height/downsamples


anchors_width = [0.03058677705095214, 0.23116773872268043, 0.1414220103912869, 0.10977491645045694, 0.06022103410168126]

>>> for x in anchors_width:
...     print x * 13   #(x *416/32)


0.397628101662   
3.00518060339
1.83848613509
1.42707391386
0.782873443322


anchors_height = [0.07247204236876549, 0.44459649900420073, 0.3643577748390009, 0.19332427832268598, 0.1260323781941343]

0.942136550794
5.77975448705
4.73665107291
2.51321561819
1.63842091652
